section.name: Project Overview
section.p: Various Maven have been created to help in the Mevenide Development Process. For now there are two plugins :

ul.li: Maven Eclipse-Plugin Plugin creates Eclipse plugins, features and site artifacts.
Maven Spinner-Wiki Plugin generates Spinner Wiki templates that have the same look-n-feel than the maven generated site.
The Maven NBM (NetBeans Module) plugin will create a Netbeans module file (.nbm)

section.p: Those Maven plugins can be found under the maven-plugins module in the Mevenide CVS repository.
